summary: The Orthonian's are not a race they are a Sisterhood of mouth lovers and their goal is to bring "oral" worship to Skyrim. They are all orally obsessed and love sexy mouths and beautiful smiles. Their Amazing smiles are intoxicating and mesmerising. Neither Man nor Woman can resist their charms!
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s5.postimg.org/f9ttkl9kn/Screen_Shot110_1600x900.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s5.postimg.org/jk8hg6enr/Screen_Shot114_1600x900.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s5.postimg.org/7sg0rmunr/Screen_Shot115_1600x900.jpg[/img][/url]

[size=5][b][color=#cc0000]The Orthonian's are not a race they are a Sisterhood of mouth lovers and their goal is to bring "oral" worship to Skyrim. They are all orally obsessed and love sexy mouths and beautiful smiles. Their Amazing smiles are intoxicating and mesmerising. Neither Man nor Woman can resist their charms![/color][/b][/size]
 
[size=5][b][color=#cc0000]The Orthonian Race is a completly new and mostly standalone Race. They have brand new Racial Powers and Abilities. Their Powers focus on their mesmerising smiles and their beauty.[/color][/b][/size]
 
[b][color=#add8e6][u]Racial Abilities:[/u][/color][/b]
 
1. [color=#afeeee][b]Orthonian Smile.[/b][/color] Their Smile is so intoxicating that they can talk their way out of almost any situation and they always get the best deals from merchants. Fortify Speechcraft and Persuasion.
 
2. [color=#afeeee][b]Orthonian Shine.[/b][/color] Their health and good oral hygene makes them naturally resistant to disease. 90% Disease Resistance.
 
[color=#afeeee][u][b]Racial Power:[/b][/u][/color]
 
1. [color=#afeeee][b]Orthonian Charm.[/b][/color] They can melt the hearts of the most brutal opponents. Passify all enemies once a day for 5 minutes.
 
[color=#ff0000][u][b]Base Skill Bonus:[/b][/u][/color]
 
[color=#afeeee]Restoration 5[/color]
[color=#afeeee]Illusion    5[/color]
[color=#afeeee]Enchanting  5[/color]
[color=#afeeee]One-handed  5[/color]
[color=#afeeee]Light Armor 5[/color]
[color=#afeeee]Speech     10[/color]
 
[color=#008000][size=5][u][b]Mods included that come from other modders:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
 
1.[color=#afeeee] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP by Dimon99. [/url]For the UNP Body.[/color]
 
2.[color=#afeeee] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal by Hellosanta. [/url]For the wonderful female body textures.[/color]
 
3.[color=#afeeee] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33117/?]Realistic Teeth by Brumbek. [/url]For creating Realistic Teeth which was the basis for my work.[/color]
 
[color=#008000][size=5][u][b]Mods included made by Me.[/b][/u][/size][/color]
 
1.[color=#afeeee] Modified female head .tri files that allow's the Orthonian Race to actually show their teeth when they smile plus show their teeth more in other expressions and phoneme's.[/color]
 
2. [color=#afeeee]Modified mouth meshes and .tri files from Realistic teeth. Includes the less gap tooth and shorter front teeth version that I made for Brumbek and modified .tri files that make the mouth fit better with the modified head files.[/color]
 
3.[color=#afeeee] Re-texture of the Realistic Teeth texture that whitens the Orthonian's Teeth as befitting an Orthonian! [/color]
 
4. [color=#afeeee]A full set of orthodontic braces made by me. They come in 5 different colors you just have to rename the texture files in the texture folder to the color you want to use. Also included in the package is the Texture resource to make new colors using GIMP or whatever else you like. [/color]
 
[color=#ff0000][size=5][b]!!!The braces are equipped by default. If you don't want them on your character you just have to rename the folder with the braces .nif and .tri files in it and the game engine wont load them!!![/b][/size][/color]
 
5. [color=#afeeee]My seperate mod called Bob's accessories is also included. Right now it only includes an equipable orthodontic Headgear appliance. The chest is located behind the smelter in Whiterun. I plan to add more stuff at some point.[/color]
 
[size=5][color=#008000][u][b]Mods Needed for this Mod to work correctly:[/b][/u][/color][/size]
 
1.[color=#afeeee] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168/?]RaceCombatability for Skyrim and Dawnguard by TMPhoenix. [/url]Just about every custom race requires this.[/color]
 
 
 
 
[color=#008000][u][b]This is V1.0 and my 1st custom race mod so there might be bugs.[/b][/u][/color]

[color=#ff0000][size=5][u][b]Credits:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
 
[color=#afeeee][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?] Dimonized UNP by Dimon99. [/url] For the UNP Body.[/color]
[color=#afeeee][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?] SG Female Textures Renewal by Hellosanta. [/url] For the wonderful female body textures.[/color]
[color=#afeeee][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33117/?] Realistic Teeth by Brumbek. [/url] For creating Realistic Teeth which was the basis for my work.[/color]
[color=#afeeee][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168/?] RaceCombatability for Skyrim and Dawnguard by TMPhoenix. [/url] For making custom races possible.[/color]
[color=#afeeee]And Bethesa for creating an amazing game![/color]

 
[color=#ff0000][size=5][u][b]Permissions:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
 
[color=#afeeee]Do as you wish with this Mod for personal use.[/color]
[color=#afeeee]For the parts of this Mod that I have created if you want to do anything publicly just ask me 1st.[/color]
[color=#afeeee]For the parts of this Mod created by others you will need their permission as well.[/color]
author: Beazalbob69
